verses.arabic: قٓ ۚ وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ ٱلْمَجِيدِ
verses.translation: Qaf: By the Glorious Qur'an (Thou art Allah's Messenger).
verses.transliteration: Qaf walqur-ani almajeed

verses.arabic: بَلْ عَجِبُوٓا۟ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٌ مِّنْهُمْ فَقَالَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ هَـٰذَا شَىْءٌ عَجِيبٌ
verses.translation: But they wonder that there has come to them a Warner from among themselves. So the Unbelievers say: "This is a wonderful thing!
verses.transliteration: Bal AAajiboo an jaahum munthirunminhum faqala alkafiroona hatha shay-onAAajeeb

verses.arabic: أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا ۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجْعٌۢ بَعِيدٌ
verses.translation: "What! When we die and become dust, (shall we live again?) That is a (sort of) return far (from our understanding)."
verses.transliteration: A-itha mitna wakunna turabanthalika rajAAun baAAeed

verses.arabic: قَدْ عَلِمْنَا مَا تَنقُصُ ٱلْأَرْضُ مِنْهُمْ ۖ وَعِندَنَا كِتَـٰبٌ حَفِيظٌۢ
verses.translation: We already know how much of them the earth takes away: With Us is a record guarding (the full account).
verses.transliteration: Qad AAalimna ma tanqusual-ardu minhum waAAindana kitabun hafeeth

verses.arabic: بَلْ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِٱلْحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمْ فَهُمْ فِىٓ أَمْرٍ مَّرِيجٍ
verses.translation: But they deny the Truth when it comes to them: so they are in a confused state.
verses.transliteration: Bal kaththaboo bilhaqqilamma jaahum fahum fee amrin mareej

verses.arabic: أَفَلَمْ يَنظُرُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَوْقَهُمْ كَيْفَ بَنَيْنَـٰهَا وَزَيَّنَّـٰهَا وَمَا لَهَا مِن فُرُوجٍ
verses.translation: Do they not look at the sky above them?- How We have made it and adorned it, and there are no flaws in it?
verses.transliteration: Afalam yanthuroo ila assama-ifawqahum kayfa banaynaha wazayyannahawama laha min furooj

verses.arabic: وَٱلْأَرْضَ مَدَدْنَـٰهَا وَأَلْقَيْنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِىَ وَأَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوْجٍۭ بَهِيجٍ
verses.translation: And the earth- We have spread it out, and set thereon mountains standing firm, and produced therein every kind of beautiful growth (in pairs)-
verses.transliteration: Wal-arda madadnahawaalqayna feeha rawasiya waanbatnafeeha min kulli zawjin baheej

verses.arabic: تَبْصِرَةً وَذِكْرَىٰ لِكُلِّ عَبْدٍ مُّنِيبٍ
verses.translation: To be observed and commemorated by every devotee turning (to Allah).
verses.transliteration: Tabsiratan wathikralikulli AAabdin muneeb

verses.arabic: وَنَزَّلْنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً مُّبَـٰرَكًا فَأَنۢبَتْنَا بِهِۦ جَنَّـٰتٍ وَحَبَّ ٱلْحَصِيدِ
verses.translation: And We send down from the sky rain charted with blessing, and We produce therewith gardens and Grain for harvests;
verses.transliteration: Wanazzalna mina assama-imaan mubarakan faanbatna bihi jannatinwahabba alhaseed

verses.arabic: وَٱلنَّخْلَ بَاسِقَـٰتٍ لَّهَا طَلْعٌ نَّضِيدٌ
verses.translation: And tall (and stately) palm-trees, with shoots of fruit-stalks, piled one over another;-
verses.transliteration: Wannakhla basiqatinlaha talAAun nadeed

verses.arabic: رِّزْقًا لِّلْعِبَادِ ۖ وَأَحْيَيْنَا بِهِۦ بَلْدَةً مَّيْتًا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلْخُرُوجُ
verses.translation: As sustenance for (Allah's) Servants;- and We give (new) life therewith to land that is dead: Thus will be the Resurrection.
verses.transliteration: Rizqan lilAAibadi waahyaynabihi baldatan maytan kathalika alkhurooj

verses.arabic: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَأَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلرَّسِّ وَثَمُودُ
verses.translation: Before them was denied (the Hereafter) by the People of Noah, the Companions of the Rass, the Thamud,
verses.transliteration: Kaththabat qablahum qawmu noohinwaas-habu arrassi wathamood

verses.arabic: وَعَادٌ وَفِرْعَوْنُ وَإِخْوَٰنُ لُوطٍ
verses.translation: The 'Ad, Pharaoh, the brethren of Lut,
verses.transliteration: WaAAadun wafirAAawnu wa-ikhwanuloot

verses.arabic: وَأَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْأَيْكَةِ وَقَوْمُ تُبَّعٍ ۚ كُلٌّ كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ وَعِيدِ
verses.translation: The Companions of the Wood, and the People of Tubba'; each one (of them) rejected the messengers, and My warning was duly fulfilled (in them).
verses.transliteration: Waas-habu al-aykati waqawmutubbaAAin kullun kaththaba arrusula fahaqqawaAAeed

verses.arabic: أَفَعَيِينَا بِٱلْخَلْقِ ٱلْأَوَّلِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِى لَبْسٍ مِّنْ خَلْقٍ جَدِيدٍ
verses.translation: Were We then weary with the first Creation, that they should be in confused doubt about a new Creation?
verses.transliteration: AfaAAayeena bilkhalqial-awwali bal hum fee labsin min khalqin jadeed

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ وَنَعْلَمُ مَا تُوَسْوِسُ بِهِۦ نَفْسُهُۥ ۖ وَنَحْنُ أَقْرَبُ إِلَيْهِ مِنْ حَبْلِ ٱلْوَرِيدِ
verses.translation: It was We Who created man, and We know what dark suggestions his soul makes to him: for We are nearer to him than (his) jugular vein.
verses.transliteration: Walaqad khalaqna al-insanawanaAAlamu ma tuwaswisu bihi nafsuhu wanahnu aqrabuilayhi min habli alwareed

verses.arabic: إِذْ يَتَلَقَّى ٱلْمُتَلَقِّيَانِ عَنِ ٱلْيَمِينِ وَعَنِ ٱلشِّمَالِ قَعِيدٌ
verses.translation: Behold, two (guardian angels) appointed to learn (his doings) learn (and noted them), one sitting on the right and one on the left.
verses.transliteration: Ith yatalaqqa almutalaqqiyaniAAani alyameeni waAAani ashshimali qaAAeed

verses.arabic: مَّا يَلْفِظُ مِن قَوْلٍ إِلَّا لَدَيْهِ رَقِيبٌ عَتِيدٌ
verses.translation: Not a word does he utter but there is a sentinel by him, ready (to note it).
verses.transliteration: Ma yalfithu min qawlinilla ladayhi raqeebun AAateed

verses.arabic: وَجَآءَتْ سَكْرَةُ ٱلْمَوْتِ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنتَ مِنْهُ تَحِيدُ
verses.translation: And the stupor of death will bring Truth (before his eyes): "This was the thing which thou wast trying to escape!"
verses.transliteration: Wajaat sakratu almawti bilhaqqithalika ma kunta minhu taheed

verses.arabic: وَنُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْوَعِيدِ
verses.translation: And the Trumpet shall be blown: that will be the Day whereof Warning (had been given).
verses.transliteration: Wanufikha fee assoori thalikayawmu alwaAAeed

verses.arabic: وَجَآءَتْ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ مَّعَهَا سَآئِقٌ وَشَهِيدٌ
verses.translation: And there will come forth every soul: with each will be an (angel) to drive, and an (angel) to bear witness.
verses.transliteration: Wajaat kullu nafsin maAAaha sa-iqunwashaheed

verses.arabic: لَّقَدْ كُنتَ فِى غَفْلَةٍ مِّنْ هَـٰذَا فَكَشَفْنَا عَنكَ غِطَآءَكَ فَبَصَرُكَ ٱلْيَوْمَ حَدِيدٌ
verses.translation: (It will be said:) "Thou wast heedless of this; now have We removed thy veil, and sharp is thy sight this Day!"
verses.transliteration: Laqad kunta fee ghaflatin min hathafakashafna AAanka ghitaaka fabasarukaalyawma hadeed

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ هَـٰذَا مَا لَدَىَّ عَتِيدٌ
verses.translation: And his Companion will say: "Here is (his Record) ready with me!"
verses.transliteration: Waqala qareenuhu hatha maladayya AAateed

verses.arabic: أَلْقِيَا فِى جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِيدٍ
verses.translation: (The sentence will be:) "Throw, throw into Hell every contumacious Rejecter (of Allah)!-
verses.transliteration: Alqiya fee jahannama kulla kaffarinAAaneed

verses.arabic: مَّنَّاعٍ لِّلْخَيْرِ مُعْتَدٍ مُّرِيبٍ
verses.translation: "Who forbade what was good, transgressed all bounds, cast doubts and suspicions;
verses.transliteration: MannaAAin lilkhayri muAAtadin mureeb

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَأَلْقِيَاهُ فِى ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلشَّدِيدِ
verses.translation: "Who set up another god beside Allah: Throw him into a severe penalty."
verses.transliteration: Allathee jaAAala maAAa Allahiilahan akhara faalqiyahu fee alAAathabiashshadeed

verses.arabic: ۞ قَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ رَبَّنَا مَآ أَطْغَيْتُهُۥ وَلَـٰكِن كَانَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍۭ بَعِيدٍ
verses.translation: His Companion will say: "Our Lord! I did not make him transgress, but he was (himself) far astray."
verses.transliteration: Qala qareenuhu rabbana maatghaytuhu walakin kana fee dalalinbaAAeed

verses.arabic: قَالَ لَا تَخْتَصِمُوا۟ لَدَىَّ وَقَدْ قَدَّمْتُ إِلَيْكُم بِٱلْوَعِيدِ
verses.translation: He will say: "Dispute not with each other in My Presence: I had already in advance sent you Warning.
verses.transliteration: Qala la takhtasimooladayya waqad qaddamtu ilaykum bilwaAAeed

verses.arabic: مَا يُبَدَّلُ ٱلْقَوْلُ لَدَىَّ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ بِظَلَّـٰمٍ لِّلْعَبِيدِ
verses.translation: "The Word changes not before Me, and I do not the least injustice to My Servants."
verses.transliteration: Ma yubaddalu alqawlu ladayya wamaana bithallamin lilAAabeed

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ نَقُولُ لِجَهَنَّمَ هَلِ ٱمْتَلَأْتِ وَتَقُولُ هَلْ مِن مَّزِيدٍ
verses.translation: One Day We will ask Hell, "Art thou filled to the full?" It will say, "Are there any more (to come)?"
verses.transliteration: Yawma naqoolu lijahannama hali imtala/tiwataqoolu hal min mazeed

verses.arabic: وَأُزْلِفَتِ ٱلْجَنَّةُ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ غَيْرَ بَعِيدٍ
verses.translation: And the Garden will be brought nigh to the Righteous,- no more a thing distant.
verses.transliteration: Waozlifati aljannatu lilmuttaqeena ghayrabaAAeed

verses.arabic: هَـٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِكُلِّ أَوَّابٍ حَفِيظٍ
verses.translation: (A voice will say:) "This is what was promised for you,- for every one who turned (to Allah) in sincere repentance, who kept (His Law),
verses.transliteration: Hatha ma tooAAadoona likulliawwabin hafeeth

verses.arabic: مَّنْ خَشِىَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنَ بِٱلْغَيْبِ وَجَآءَ بِقَلْبٍ مُّنِيبٍ
verses.translation: "Who feared (Allah) Most Gracious Unseen, and brought a heart turned in devotion (to Him):
verses.transliteration: Man khashiya arrahmanabilghaybi wajaa biqalbin muneeb

verses.arabic: ٱدْخُلُوهَا بِسَلَـٰمٍ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْخُلُودِ
verses.translation: "Enter ye therein in Peace and Security; this is a Day of Eternal Life!"
verses.transliteration: Odkhulooha bisalamin thalikayawmu alkhulood

verses.arabic: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ فِيهَا وَلَدَيْنَا مَزِيدٌ
verses.translation: There will be for them therein all that they wish,- and more besides in Our Presence.
verses.transliteration: Lahum ma yashaoona feehawaladayna mazeed

verses.arabic: وَكَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّن قَرْنٍ هُمْ أَشَدُّ مِنْهُم بَطْشًا فَنَقَّبُوا۟ فِى ٱلْبِلَـٰدِ هَلْ مِن مَّحِيصٍ
verses.translation: But how many generations before them did We destroy (for their sins),- stronger in power than they? Then did they wander through the land: was there any place of escape (for them)?
verses.transliteration: Wakam ahlakna qablahum min qarnin humashaddu minhum batshan fanaqqaboo fee albiladi halmin mahees

verses.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكْرَىٰ لِمَن كَانَ لَهُۥ قَلْبٌ أَوْ أَلْقَى ٱلسَّمْعَ وَهُوَ شَهِيدٌ
verses.translation: Verily in this is a Message for any that has a heart and understanding or who gives ear and earnestly witnesses (the truth).
verses.transliteration: Inna fee thalika lathikraliman kana lahu qalbun aw alqa assamAAawahuwa shaheed

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فِى سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍ وَمَا مَسَّنَا مِن لُّغُوبٍ
verses.translation: We created the heavens and the earth and all between them in Six Days, nor did any sense of weariness touch Us.
verses.transliteration: Walaqad khalaqna assamawatiwal-arda wama baynahuma fee sittatiayyamin wama massana min lughoob

verses.arabic: فَٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ قَبْلَ طُلُوعِ ٱلشَّمْسِ وَقَبْلَ ٱلْغُرُوبِ
verses.translation: Bear, then, with patience, all that they say, and celebrate the praises of thy Lord, before the rising of the sun and before (its) setting.
verses.transliteration: Fasbir AAala mayaqooloona wasabbih bihamdi rabbika qabla tulooAAiashshamsi waqabla alghuroob

verses.arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَأَدْبَـٰرَ ٱلسُّجُودِ
verses.translation: And during part of the night, (also,) celebrate His praises, and (so likewise) after the postures of adoration.
verses.transliteration: Wamina allayli fasabbihhu waadbaraassujood

verses.arabic: وَٱسْتَمِعْ يَوْمَ يُنَادِ ٱلْمُنَادِ مِن مَّكَانٍ قَرِيبٍ
verses.translation: And listen for the Day when the Caller will call out from a place quiet near,-
verses.transliteration: WastamiAA yawma yunadi almunadimin makanin qareeb

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ يَسْمَعُونَ ٱلصَّيْحَةَ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْخُرُوجِ
verses.translation: The Day when they will hear a (mighty) Blast in (very) truth: that will be the Day of Resurrection.
verses.transliteration: Yawma yasmaAAoona assayhatabilhaqqi thalika yawmu alkhurooj

verses.arabic: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْىِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَإِلَيْنَا ٱلْمَصِيرُ
verses.translation: Verily it is We Who give Life and Death; and to Us is the Final Goal-
verses.transliteration: Inna nahnu nuhyeewanumeetu wa-ilayna almaseer

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ تَشَقَّقُ ٱلْأَرْضُ عَنْهُمْ سِرَاعًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ حَشْرٌ عَلَيْنَا يَسِيرٌ
verses.translation: The Day when the Earth will be rent asunder, from (men) hurrying out: that will be a gathering together,- quite easy for Us.
verses.transliteration: Yawma tashaqqaqu al-ardu AAanhum siraAAanthalika hashrun AAalayna yaseer

verses.arabic: نَّحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ ۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيْهِم بِجَبَّارٍ ۖ فَذَكِّرْ بِٱلْقُرْءَانِ مَن يَخَافُ وَعِيدِ
verses.translation: We know best what they say; and thou art not one to overawe them by force. So admonish with the Qur'an such as fear My Warning!
verses.transliteration: Nahnu aAAlamu bima yaqooloonawama anta AAalayhim bijabbarin fathakkir bilqur-animan yakhafu waAAeed
